properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:22PM MST until January 28 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Freezing rain possible. Total
accumulations of 5 to 10 inches for Lookout Pass and mountain
locations. Total accumulations of 1 to 2 inches for valleys and
ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains,
Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to
Haugan.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 2 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY
